promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic ibex dark-type pokemon with ancient antlers. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Antlichorn, a a chibi cute basic ibex dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Darkness Charge, Rob. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "dark" or "Antlichorn". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, ibex-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Antlichorn thrives in castle realms, using its charm to blend in. It harnesses the shadows to power up, and robs opponents' energy, always one step ahead.
